casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Joseph MOORE. No. 460A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 6, 2007. William F.W. Massengale, Chapel Hill, for Moore. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Moore) shall have up to and including the 12th day of November 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of September 2007."
